title: Keyboard not working
body: My keyboard worked perfectly fine a couple days ago. Now today i update go into an aram and none of my spells work. So i alt tabbed out and start typing qwer and they work fine on anything. I cant press d or f or even p to buy from the shop when dead.  I dont know whats wrong. I even restored all the defaults and still nothing.

replies.body:
Have you made any modifications to your config?  It sounds like something with your configuration messed up, so I suggest resetting it as your first step:

 **Log into the game** then hop into **a custom game**. *Alt+Tab* out of the match, then navigate to your League installation folder, which should be in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Delete the folder named **Config**

Once you've deleted the folder, leave the custom match. You'll then want to hop into another custom match to confirm the changes were saved.

Keep in mind that you will need to re-do any bindings as a result.  Let me know if that helped!
